active_skill.en_text: Change all orbs to Wood, Light, and Dark orbs; Enhance all Wood orbs

jp_skill.name: 玄武七星想
jp_skill.raw_description: 全ドロップを木、光、闇ドロップに変化。 木ドロップを強化。

kr_skill.name: 현무칠성상
kr_skill.raw_description: 모든 드롭을 나무, 빛, 어둠드롭으로 변화 나무드롭을 강화

na_skill.name: Genbu Seven-Star Perception
na_skill.raw_description: Changes all Orbs to Wood, Light & Dark Orbs; Wood Orbs enhanced

en_as_text: Change all orbs to Wood, Light, and Dark orbs; Enhance all Wood orbs
en_ls_text: 4x ATK when matching Wood, Light, Dark at once; 2x ATK for matched Att. when matching 5 Orbs with 1+ enhanced

behavior._name: ※自分のレベルが ai 以上の時 rnd に分岐

params: ドロップが見えなくなった
드롭이 보이지 않는다
Unable to see Orbs
2ターンの間、木属性攻撃を吸収
2턴 동안 나무속성 공격을 흡수
Absorbs Wood Att. attacks for 2 turns

behavior._name: ※カウンターが ai 以上の時 rnd に分岐

params: 1ターンの間、ダメージを激減する
1턴 동안 대미지를 격감
Damage greatly reduced for 1 turn

behavior._name: ※カウンターを ai にセット
笑わないでくださいっ！
params: 2ターンの間、持ち時間が2秒減る
2턴 동안 조작시간이 2초 줄어든다
Orb move time -2 seconds for 2 turns
